text:
-daqgnirvai$SvakarmaqNaH suva#rdEqvEShu# nO dadhat ||
yEnA# saqhasraqM ~Mvaha#siq yEnA$gnE sarvavEdaqsaM | 
tEnEqmaM ~Myaqj~jaM nO# vahaq suva#rdEqvEShuq ganta#vE ||
yEnA$gnEq dakShi#NA yuqktA yaqj~jaM ~Mvaha#ntyRuqtvija#H | 
tEnEqmaM ~Myaqj~jaM nO# vahaq suva#rdEqvEShuq ganta#vE ||
yEnA$gnEq suqkRuta#H paqthA madhOqd^^rdhArA$ vyAnaqSuH | 
tEnEqmaM ~Myaqj~jaM nO# vahaq suva#rdEqvEShuq ganta#vE ( ) ||
yatraq dhArAq ana#pEtAq madhO$rGRuqtasya# caq yAH | 
tadaqgnirvai$SvakarmaqNaH suva#rdEqvEShu# nO dadhat || 32
(AqgacCAqt - ta - dvayA#naqSu stEnEqmaM ~Myaqj~jaM nO# vahaq suva#rdEqvEShuq ganta#vEq - catu#rdaSa ca) (A7)
